title: Furriest Friends Carpet and Room Deodorizer – Pet Odor Eliminator Neutralizer - Pet Safe - Environmentally Friendly – Odor Remover - Natural Non-Abrasive Powder
description: If you have a dog or cat that likes to leave a mess then Furriest Friends Carpet and Room Deodorizer is just what you need to have your home smelling fresh and clean. Damp and wet pets can leave a bad odor on carpets and rugs which worsens over time. The odor becomes trapped in carpet fibers and simple vacuuming won’t solve the problem. Our solution works on all types of carpets. One 14oz container of our corn cob carpet deodorizer will get to work on up to 25 rooms measuring approximately 10’ x 10. Simply sprinkle sparingly on affected carpets or rugs, wait a few minutes for the powder to do its work and then vacuum as normal. The nasty odors will be gone and your room, carpet and rugs will smell fresh and clean. Our pet odor eliminator also helps reduce static build up on carpets. As well as a great pet odor neutralizer, our carpet freshener can work on odors caused by vomit, urine, food, cooking, smoke, and mold and mildew too. Before sprinkling the powder please make sure that the surface you are treating is dry. If it adheres to wet spots then leave to dry before rubbing with a stiff brush and vacuum.
